name: Safavieh_Kerstin_Arctic_Grey_Arched__Headboard_(Queen)
reviews: The headboard itself is fine. It is substantial, well made and good quality. I was also able to put it together and set it up on my own. But if you are looking for a light gray as is pictured, this is not that headboard. This is a much darker blue-gray, heavy on the blue. It was not what I was expecting at all.
the headboard has a 2-3 inch pucker in the fabric in a strategic location on the headboard. It's not awful but not what I would consider great quality
The color in the picture is not the actual color that you will receive
description:
Romantic and refined, the beautifully arched Kerstin queen
headboard adds architectural interest to any bedroom in need of a
dramatic focal point. Luxuriously high for comfortable TV viewing
and reading, this headboard is richly upholstered in chic arctic
grey with extra padding emphasizing a lavish border. Attaches to
any standard size metal frame bed.Color: Arctic greyMaterials: Plywood and terelyne/ cotton fabricDimensions: 54.3 inches high x 61.8 inches wide x 3.9 inches
  deepThis product will ship to you in 1 box.StyleTransitionalMaterialCotton, Fabric, WoodTypeUpholsteredFinishGrey FinishAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorGreyFurniture PatternSolid
